name: Missing (DevLiamW)
description:
Liam West (DevLiamW)

W, A, S, D - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Left Mouse Button - Interact/Select parent

E - interact (some doors)

You have lost your mother. You must find her within the busy streets of China, before entering the New Year. The festivities are afoot... However beware, for if you speak to a stranger you will lose a life. If all lives are MISSING, then you will be kidnapped. Best of luck.

Against the clock.

Randomized parent to find in each play-through.

Chinese street scene.

References to music will be given on request.

Website: https://devliamw.webflow.io/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DevLiamW

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/devliamw/
